title: SUFFRAGE, ATHEISM, & EVOLUTION With Kimberly Hamlin
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary:
I'm joined by professor Kimberly Hamlin to discuss her latest book: Free Thinker: Sex, Suffrage, and the Extraordinary Life of Helen Hamilton Gardener. We cover the concept of a "fallen woman', women's suffrage, the relations between feminism, atheism, evolution & race.

Patreon:  https://www.patreon.com/PoliticalPhilosophyPodcast

Website: https://www.politicalphilosophypodcast.com/
itunes:subtitle: I'm joined by professor Kimberly Hamlin to discusâ€¦
